extendedInfo.description: This app is available in English, Spanish, France, German, Portuguese, Italian and Turkish.Included option to change language.Here it is the only application of Dragon City, the game which is causing a sensation in FacebookThis application provides you a guide to get all dragon eggs in this game. You only have to keep pressed the egg you want and then you will obtain the combination you have to do in order to get that egg.The application lets you save what eggs you have, so you will always know what eggs are not in your collection yet. You only have to select the eggs you already have and select the option "Save" in the menu. Once you have saved your settings, you will be able to load them by selecting the option "Load" in the menu every time you open the application, so you will see all the eggs you had selected previously.Do not miss the opportunity of getting all the eggs and complete your islands with all the available dragons in the game.If you have any advice or maybe you detected any failure, feel free to email me your advice or the failure you found.

reviews.title: very useful
reviews.comment: For those complaining you didn\'t get the desired result, if you read the section about the app (within the app and here) they tell you that\'s possible. So will ANY website you find for the same info. it\'s part of the game, you play the odds. **would give 5 *\'s if you added breeding times and what elements they\'re to** otherwise useful to look up here instead of searching online while playing.
reviews.author: brandi beattie

reviews.title: The app is good but ...
reviews.comment: The app is good but phe pure elementals are wrong. You  need to breed pure dragon + dragons that have two or more elements and thair primary element needs to be the one element you want your pure dragon to have. Ex: pure dragon + mud dragon = pure terra       pure dragon + soccer dragon = pure ice
reviews.author: Darko Bashukoski

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: Ok my friend got a legendary dragon just by breeding armadillo and cool fire. So I was wondering how to get an armadillo since I had a cool fire but then I came across this app and then I had a mirror dragon this app is rlly gewd.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great tool....used to be.
reviews.comment: Hasn\'t been updated in some time.  Dragon city had changed its breeding dramatically since this was correct.

reviews.title: Great except..
reviews.comment: It\'s great and works flawlessly except it needs new updates to the newest dragons. I love this app and if you update this definitely 5 stars.

reviews.comment: Having trouble breeding the rest of the pure dragons and the wind dragon.\tWhat combinations do you use for the pure ice, pure electric, pure nature, pure metal, and pure fire. I\'ve tried breeding the wind dragon but end up with something else.

reviews.title: Why?

I\'ve tryed the load button, but nothing happened, why? I\'ve tryed the save button but nothing happens, why? Plz can som1 help? I need a load of dragons.
